mapper.insert: insert into problem(author_id, `name`, description, input_format, output_format, explanation, samples, time_limit, memory_limit) values (#{authorId}, #{name}, #{description}, #{inputFormat}, #{outputFormat}, #{explanation}, #{samples}, #{timeLimit}, #{memoryLimit})
mapper.update: update problem set `name`=#{name}, description=#{description}, input_format=#{inputFormat}, output_format=#{outputFormat}, explanation=#{explanation}, samples=#{samples}, time_limit=#{timeLimit}, memory_limit=#{memoryLimit} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, name, submit, accept from problem where `name` like concat('%', #{name}, '%') limit #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}
select count(*) from problem where `name` like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
